turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I just wonder if you know any good places to go and eat today.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Or maybe to get something to eat. I'm looking maybe to for some delivery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of food?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's see here what I'm in the mood for. Do you have any suggestions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think there's a new pizzeria in.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there is a new pizzeria called bela luna's, would you like to try that one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I think I'd like two pizzas, small.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: and.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking maybe a specialty pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Maybe, one of them will make my chicken barbecue. And the other one, I think I'll have pepperonis, onions, cheese, extra cheese, and more pepperonis.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And make a thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so 2 small pizzas. one chicken bbq and the other with pepperoni, onions and extra cheese. thin crust on both. correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total is $34.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That'll be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bela luna's soo, bye!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.
